content: i have thoroughly enjoyed making these ~ and am sure to make more i made a teddy bear panda frog mouse and cat the pattern includes a basic face with rounded ears and a basic face with pointy ears too perfect for a cat so cute each little face requires ~ dk yarn around 2g 3 75mm crochet hook or a 4mm hook will be fine oddments of yarn for features - or small buttons - or tiny pieces of felt perhaps have fun - be creative
